snippet.title: Hitman: Sniper Challenge Launch Trailer [US-FF]
snippet.description:
HITMAN®: SNIPER CHALLENGE™ is an exclusive standalone pre-order sniper experience, available to play from the moment customers pre-order their copy of HITMAN®: ABSOLUTION™. The HITMAN: SNIPER CHALLENGE experience is available starting from today.

HITMAN: ABSOLUTION is scheduled for global release on November 20th 2012 for the PlayStation®3 computer entertainment system, Xbox 360® video game and entertainment system from Microsoft and Windows PC.
